titles.title: Patrick Leahy and Orrin G. Hatch Justice For All Act of 2022
Patrick Leahy and Orrin G. Hatch Justice For All Act of 2022
A bill to reauthorize the Paul Coverdell Forensic Sciences Improvement Grant Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Patrick Leahy and Orrin G. Hatch Justice For All Act of 2022
This bill reauthorizes, modifies, and establishes programs that address the quality of forensic science, the privacy of victims of crimes, and the integrity of criminal convictions.
